result.reason: Implement a new feature to list sessions, similar to Remote Desktop Connection Manager, providing a centralized view of active or configured connections.
result.approach: Create a new form (FrmSessionList.cs) containing a custom MrngListView (or SessionListView inheriting from it) to display session details. Develop a SessionListProvider class to retrieve and format session information from the existing connection management system. Integrate the new form into FrmMain.cs via a menu item or toolbar button, enabling users to access the session list function.
